R

randomIndex(int) - Method in class JFiles.service.PasswordGenerator
 
rankCalculation(String) - Method in class JFiles.Controllers.Statistic
Calculate personal rank
It depend on win/loose/even ratio.
redirectAttributes - Variable in class JFiles.service.PageService
 
REGISTRATION - Static variable in interface JFiles.Constants.Page
 
Registration - Class in JFiles.Controllers
Controller is responsible for registration menu
Registration() - Constructor for class JFiles.Controllers.Registration
 
registration(Model, String, String, String, MultipartFile) - Method in class JFiles.Controllers.Registration
Make checks of input data
Add User record to database
Send welcome email
Generate authorization key and include registered user to Logged Users list
REGISTRATION_ERR_EMAIL - Static variable in interface JFiles.Constants.PageService.Tag
 
REGISTRATION_ERR_USER_NAME - Static variable in interface JFiles.Constants.PageService.Tag
 
REGISTRATION_ERR_USER_PASSWORD - Static variable in interface JFiles.Constants.PageService.Tag
 
REGISTRATION_SAVED_EMAIL - Static variable in interface JFiles.Constants.PageService.Tag
 
REGISTRATION_SAVED_USER_NAME - Static variable in interface JFiles.Constants.PageService.Tag
 
REGISTRATION_SAVED_USER_PASSWORD - Static variable in interface JFiles.Constants.PageService.Tag
 
remove(String) - Method in interface JFiles.dao.UserDAO
 
remove(String) - Method in class JFiles.dao.UserDAOimpl
 
remove(String) - Method in interface JFiles.service.UserService
 
remove(String) - Method in class JFiles.service.UserServiceImpl
 
removeSession(int) - Method in class JFiles.service.SessionLogin.LoginSession
 
removeUser(RedirectAttributes, int, String, int) - Method in class JFiles.Controllers.AdminUserTable
Delete record based on deleteUserName parameter
removeUser(String) - Method in class JFiles.service.Game.GamePool
Remove userName from GameSession instance, so it become not accessible via getGame
If both players have been removed - GameSession instance removed as well
Note: GameSession should be removed from server only when both players are decided to leave game, otherwise when one player leave the game other one leaves as well
resetPassword(RedirectAttributes, int, String, int) - Method in class JFiles.Controllers.AdminUserTable
Reset password based on user name
Generate new password via PasswordGenerator service
Generate and send email with new password via htmlEmail service
Role - Interface in JFiles.Constants
Role value and role name
There are 3 types of access
USER - without access to Admin menu
ADMIN - limited access to Admin menu (he is able to reset password for any user and view or download User and Statistics tables
SUPER_ADMIN - is able to edit User and Statistics tables (Developer role)
role - Variable in class JFiles.model.UserEntity
